about.title: Who I Am?
about.description:
Hello, my name is André Rodrigues, I’m 21 years old.
I’m currently in my third year of a Bachelor's Degree in Technologies and Information Systems for the Web.
Throughout my studies, I’ve worked on design and web development projects in small teams, learning to manage tight deadlines and deliver clear results.
I’m now looking for an internship or junior role where I can apply my programming and UI design skills, contribute to a company’s growth, and continue developing professionally and personally.

skills.title: Skills
skills.first_skill: UI/UX Design: Experienced with Figma and Miro
skills.second_skill: 3D & Prototyping: Worked with Blender and ProtoPie
skills.third_skill: Project Management: Familiar with Trello and Notion

degrees.title: Degrees
degrees.first_degree: Higher Technical Professional Course in Design and Technologies for Mobile Applications (CTeSP)
degrees.seconde_degree: 3º Bachelor's Degree in Technologies and Information Systems for the Web
